title: Maldives Island Paradise

itinerary.title: Arrival & Resort Check-in
itinerary.description: Speedboat transfer to your overwater villa. Welcome drinks and resort orientation.

itinerary.title: Snorkeling & Water Sports
itinerary.description: Explore vibrant coral reefs, try water sports, or simply relax on pristine beaches.

itinerary.title: Sunset Cruise & Spa
itinerary.description: Evening dolphin watching cruise followed by a relaxing spa treatment.

itinerary.title: Island Hopping
itinerary.description: Visit local islands, experience Maldivian culture, and enjoy fresh seafood.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Final breakfast and transfer to airport.

description: Escape to crystal-clear waters, white sand beaches, and luxurious overwater villas in the Maldives.
